LanguageData.Snork.label: 바다코끼리
LanguageData.Snork.description: There's a distinct resemblance between 바다코끼리s and walruses but it's impossible to tell which came first as lot of the datalogs of Earthen fauna has been poorly kept and corrupted. Their tusks are a very high demand luxury item.
LanguageData.Terramorph.label: 테라모르프
LanguageData.Terramorph.description: 테라모르프s are a type of large beetle with a pair of sharp tusks, thick 키틴 plating and a toxic bite. They are well adapted to survive in extreme temperatures, be it glacial environments or scorching deserts.
